page.title: 14A day at my primary-school
page.content:
TIMETABLE OF AN 8yr. olds' DAY. 8.45 Assembly with local vicar. 9.15 Nuffield Maths, + computer group. 10.30 Playtime. 10.50 Art/Craft 11.45 Class story(Wind In The Willows) 12.00 Lunch + Playtime 13.00 English (comprehension and language exercises) 14.00 Scottish Dancing 14.45 Home
Lunch, at 60p. per day, is prepared on the premises by a school cook. A typical meal would be- Tomato soup + a bread roll. Corned beef, mixed vegetables. Fruit yoghurt.
Some children bring a packed lunch of sandwiches, crisps, fruit and a biscuit.
